Jura... Imagine if Mejare, and Tarak, and every single culture you've met all had territories on a single planet. That's Earth, more or less.
Cats are cute, and have very soft fur. People claim they're standoffish, true, but they're actually quite affectionate in their own way.
...Maybe a light novel about a teenage boy who gets sent to a fantasy world? I imagine that concept isn't very heavily explored yet...
...It's a little grim, but... Maybe a story about people with amazing powers competing in a deadly game? That sounds fresh and new.
...A romantic comedy, perhaps? A story in which an average boy suddenly gains the affection of several girls would stand out, I bet...
...That... does sound quite impressive... If it's as lovely a bonding experience as you say, I think I'd like to see it someday.
You're not wrong... But even so, I'd rather not make an enemy if it's unneeded. 10 friends is better than 9 friends and 1 foe, after all.
Well... Since you're offering, I'd be grateful for any insight you could lend me.
...I can't recall any trauma. I'd just... try to chat, but get so nervous that I'd tense up and stay silent. Which made others nervous, so...
...It wasn't anyone's fault, really. I just... didn't know how to talk to strangers, so I'd go all silent and tense... which made kids anxious.
Well... To be honest, it's not like I haven't thought about it before. There are just certain steps to be taken beforehand, and... I haven't, mostly.
Well... It's not that I don't want to. It's just a matter of making sure the other person... knows, and reciprocates, and is prepared.
Well... To be honest, I do feel ready -- for the right person. But making sure that person knows and is also ready is... its own challenge.
...I don't disagree with that. It's just... There's a difference between deciding to fly a ship and actually doing it without crashing and exploding, yes...?
...You're right. We do plan to confess as soon as we're both emotionally ready. But if we were to try before that point, it would be... disastrous.
If you're emotionally prepared for potential rejection and heartbreak, then... yes, you're right. We just need a bit more time to get to that point.
Najimi... has a mischievous streak, and can be pretty impulsive. But they rarely go too far, and their pranks have even helped me grow a bit.
Well... Najimi doesn't always think through the full consequences of their pranks. But they mean well, and it's rarely more than I can handle.
...In any case, I appreciate your concern. I... did find you a little scary at first... But knowing that you're looking out for me puts me at ease.
I'm flattered that you think I'd do well, but I'm not that desperate! Although... Maybe clothed modeling wouldn't be nearly so bad...
...Thank you, Jura, but I'll save that as a very last resort. I'm... flattered, but If I have to model, I would much, much rather do it clothed.
Jura... I mean no offense, but I hope I never get the chance to visit Mejare.
